message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This item holds significant value for us, and we believe it would be equally valuable to you. Given its importance, we're offering it to you at an exclusive price of $12,000. We understand its worth to you is $10,000, but we hope this offer presents a fair compromise that benefits both parties. Should you have any questions or need more information, please don't hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response.
